remarks: A Cauchy sequence of real numbers converges to its limit supremum.  The fourth hypothesis specifies that ` F ` is a Cauchy sequence. (Contributed by NM, 4-Apr-2005.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 8-May-2016.)
